text_block_list.text: Summer training camp is here! It's the perfect, special period to get in shape!
While some students are tense, Matikanetannhauser is——

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: On the bus, when it comes to traveling, of course!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Oh my~. Hehe, this game is quite difficult, isn't it~?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The trick is not to think! It's reflexes, reflexes for pyoi!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: That's right! For example, look, when you say 'sauna'——

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: No, no, you're going back, going back.
Carrying the lively Umamusume, the bus slowly headed toward the training camp lodge.
